snippet: Pursuing his campaign for the idea that millionaires should pay income taxes of at least 30 percent, President Obama surrounded himself with a well-heeled and like-minded cast of supporters.
abstract: Pursuing his campaign for the idea that millionaires should pay income taxes of at least 30 percent, President Obama surrounded himself with a well-heeled and like-minded cast of supporters.

headline.print_headline: Million-Dollar Chorus For Obama Tax Plan
